title: Zambos Salsa Verde Prepared with Chirmol
instructions: Step 1: Chop the tomato, onion and cilantro.
Step 2: Mix in a bowl and season with the salt and pepper
Step 3: For the sauce, combine the mayonnaise, water, onion, lemon juice, cilantro, salt and pepper in a blender. Process until you have a homogeneous sauce.
Step 4: Serve the chirmol and sauce with Zambos Salsa Verde.
